text: “Khawa jarra John in baptize thona achong rilni makheiya inphut Pumi Jisu'n eini diangnga inphut marwaantiang ikal nikhuo katung, eini karra Pumi Jisu'n asi-ahongnga alei-omlai lei-inruoipui mi-ngai karra inkhat einile inruoiya Pumi Jisu hongringna sakhi ana-epuisik eii.” Matt 3:16; Mk 1:9; 16:19; Luk 3:21; 24:51
